text: Affirmation is the second and final studio album by Australian pop duo Savage Garden and was released on 9 November 1999 by Columbia Records. It won the 2000 ARIA Music Award for Highest Selling Album along it nominated for Best Group and Best Pop Release but lost. It topped the album charts in Australia, Canada and Sweden and made the top 10 in Denmark, Finland, New Zealand, Norway, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. ==Track listings== * All songs written by Darren Hayes and Daniel Jones, and produced by Walter Afanasieff. ==References== Category:1999 albums Category:Savage Garden albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: Affirmation (Savage Garden album)
